product_name: Shimano XT M785 SPD Mountain Bike Pedals
long_description: The Shimano XT M785 SPD mountain bike pedals offer a low-profile platform for increased contact area, great mud-shedding ability and a sturdy build for tough trail riding.
short_description: The Shimano XT M785 SPD mountain bike pedals offer a low-profile platform for increased contact area, great mud-shedding ability and a sturdy build for tough trail riding.
